title: Skin Ideas: Anchorman-Nautilus/Arcade-Nocturne and so on
body:
I have a few skin ideas that I would really like to see implemented into League.
First is Anchorman Nautilus. I know right. He would be wearing a dark red suit and have a microphone/camera instead of an anchor, his w would be news logos floating around him.

Next is Arcade Nocturne. His character model would resemble the ship from Galaga; His q would be like the speed boost things from Mario Kart, his e would make pixelated birds flying around the enemy's head. For his ultimate instead of the screen going dark it would flash with rainbow colours and when he dashes his engines will fire up (because he's a spaceship) and he would go all _warp speed_ on their a**es.

Another one is Dunkmaster Brand. He would be wearing a jersey similar to Darius's but would be a little burnt and the team on the front wouldn't be there. His q he throws a flaming basketball, his w I'm not quite sure about, his e would be the same and for his ult he will throw a large flaming basketball that will bounce across all of the enemies' heads.

Duel Master Twisted Fate. Heavily based on Yu-Gi-Oh. He would have have spiked up yellow hair and a black trench coat. His three coloured cards would be the three Egyptian god cards (Blue=Obelisk Red=Slifer Gold=Ra). No more is needed.

replies.body: Dunkmaster Brand was a good idea but I would consider renaming it for Brand has no "dunk" in his kit
Duel master TF would not work due to copyright. Hence King Rammus was removed.
I just had to put it there, the urge was too great.
